function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate economic and technical impacts assessment of bacs improvement packages.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective evaluations of indoor environments by occupants may not align with objective measures, leading to discrepancies in assessing indoor environmental quality.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narrow control clauses in commercial office tenancy agreements may lead to suboptimal indoor temperature management, potentially impacting occupant comfort and energy efficiency.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Democratization of analytics for non-experts through easy-to-use web tools and dashboards","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on big data leading to prioritization of data-driven research over traditional scientific method","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between air pollution and human illness","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited information about covariables such as health services, epidemiological traits, and population movement hinders the assessment of the relative importance of air pollution among socio-environmental driving factors of COVID-19 infections.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between respiratory illness and chronic exposure to air pollutants","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between COVID-19 and chronic exposure to air pollution","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of air pollutants such as formaldehyde, carbon monoxide, and particulate matter PM 2.5 are associated with increased COVID-19 infections and fatalities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative correlation between aerosol data from satellites and COVID-19 fatalities, but positive correlation with infections.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contrary to other pollutants, higher levels of O3 and SO2 from satellite and ground data were not associated with more COVID-19 deaths and mortality rates.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation analysis between air pollution and COVID-19 variables","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geospatial mapping and visualization of COVID-19 and air pollution","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High viral infections in areas with air pollutants","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of COVID-19 as a highly contagious respiratory illness caused by a novel coronavirus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk factors for fast spread of the virus, including age, gender, and smoking status","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation spread about the disease","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive scientific studies on covid-19 impact on human development and well-being","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trans-disciplinary health science research must be prioritized to develop a universal response to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extensive research is needed to understand the covid-19 crisis life cycle and its causes and consequences","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research studies are needed to explore the interconnection of climate change to the development of the virus and its potential environmental factors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on physical distancing and behavioral modification","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integrated environmental and health management perspective","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supported physical distancing interventions leading to high epidemic peaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spontaneous behavioral reactions and rumors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news and misinformation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant rise in domestic violence","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of need-based initiatives and geopolitical cooperation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to lockdown-related limitations on economic activities and livelihoods","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in domestic violence cases and mental health issues due to social isolation and lockdowns","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developmental impacts on health, education, gender, economy, politics, and the environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate covid-19 information in literature","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of grey literature in the study","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to employment and income of millions of people","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear and anxiety due to economic shocks and recession","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of travel constraints and quarantine measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and work environment concerns for remote workers","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective communication leading to lack of updates and information for furloughed employees.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to challenges faced during remote work, isolation, and lack of equipment.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unemployment due to workplace closures","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness on ipc measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of mental health outcomes","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inexperienced researchers for screening","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in quality assessment resolved mutually between reviewers","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of random-effects meta-analysis method without considering common effect size","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of formal quantitative synthesis for changes in work arrangements and worker education interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential absence of publication bias can lead to skewed data and inaccurate findings.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete response to the impact of natural light on virus propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about job status and financial condition leading to poor mental health","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
